mapper.insert: insert into members(email, nick, pwd) values(#{email}, #{nickName}, sha1(#{password}))
mapper.select: select m.mno, m.email, m.nick, m.photo, m.grade, g.grno from members m left outer join garage g on g.mno = m.mno where email=#{email} and pwd=sha1(#{password}) order by g.grno limit 1
select count(mno) from members where email=#{email}
select count(mno) from members where nick=#{nickName}
select email, nick, photo from members where mno=#{memberNo}
mapper.update: update members set nick=#{nickName}, pwd=sha1(#{password}) where mno=#{memberNo}
